products.title: Burst Pastel Yellow Vertical Blind
products.description: As soft as a yellow can be before it starts drifting into beige territory, this gorgeously chill tone relies on its washed out colour to add a certain flexibility that yellows tend to lack. Perfect for adding a gentle coloured accent to rooms with a more solid colour scheme, it mixes well with browns, blues or greys to soften the tone of the room. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Burst Yellow Submarine Vertical Blind
products.description: Make a statement in your home with the vibrant yellow colour in the burst yellow submarine. This blind is sure to add some zing to your interior and with a name like yellow submarine youll be singing your way round your home before you know it. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Splash Solar Yellow 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Splash solar yellow is a bright and sunny yellow vertical blind perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this fabulous yellow vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Rose Gold 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their splash rose gold vertical blinds are contemporary and stylish. A moisture-resistant rose gold fabric with a beautiful hue, makes this blind a great addition to a kitchen or bathroom. With a variety of control and stacking options available on their headrails, this blind can be easily tailored to work for any window. At swift direct blinds, with fifty years of blind making experiance, quality comes first.

products.title: Splash Mellow Yellow 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: A family favourite, their splash range comes in a wide variety of colours and blinds. Splash mellow yellow is a chic pastel yellow vertical blind - perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this yellow vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Vitra Blackout Sunburst Yellow 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: This sunburst yellow blackout vertical blind adds a invigorating splash of colour to your home, whilst blocking the light. Value for money and made from high-quality polyester-based fabric, your new yellow blackout vertical blind is perfect for office, bedroom and living rooms. At swift direct blinds, not only is is this bright yellow vertical blind hand made to your measurements, by their expert team, it also comes with a free five year guarantee.

products.title: Parkinson Golden Lime Vertical Blind
products.description: Natural tones contrast with the geometric effect of the slubs in this gently textured fabric for a unique and stylish look that dazzles without overpowering. products.title: Bella Blackout Solar Yellow 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This bright sunny yellow vertical blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Bella Blackout Mellow Yellow 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: This pastel mellow yellow vertical blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. Their bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. Loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Yellow - Vertical Blind
products.description: The soft, pastel hue of the palermo (blackout) yellow will bring colour and sunshine wherever it goes. When the sun is out, and the blind is open, they will serve only to accent each other, creating a gorgeous glow in your home. The yellow will work best with other pastels, or with whites, and can be used to add a subtle infusion of warm colour to an otherwise neutral room. Choose it for your home office or entry hallway for a distinctly pretty flush of colour.

products.title: Annie Gold
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 500mm max drop: 4000mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
